get.summary:
Retrieves asset information for the specified asset ID. The authenticated user must be able to manage the asset 
or granted by package permission.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort by version number, default is desc.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The amount of results per request.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The paging cursor for the previous or next page.

401.description: 0: Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets the place configuration for the place with the id {placeId}

parameters.name: placeId
parameters.description: The place id for the place to be updated.

403.description: Authenticated user is not authorized to manage this place.

401.description: 0: Authorization has been denied for this request.

patch.summary: Updates the place configuration for the place with the id {placeId}

parameters.name: placeId
parameters.description: The place id for the place to be updated.

403.description:
Authenticated user is not authorized to manage this place.
0: Token Validation Failed

401.description: 0: Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary:
Get settings for an owned universe. 
V2 Contains data for avatar scale and asset override.

403.description: 2: You are not authorized to configure this universe.

patch.summary:
Update universe settings for an owned universe.
V2 Contains data for avatar scale and asset override.

400.description:
1: The universe does not exist.
3: Invalid UniverseAvatarType.
4: Invalid UniverseScaleType.
5: Invalid UniverseAnimationType.
6: Invalid UniverseCollisionType.
7: New universe name or description has been rejected.
8: New universe name is too long.
10: Invalid UniverseBodyType.
11: Invalid UniverseJointPositioningType.
12: The universe has no root place.
13: At least one playable device must be provided.
15: Price is required when isForSale is true.
16: This game cannot be offered for sale because it is not public.
17: This game cannot be offered for sale because it has private servers enabled.
18: The game price is outside of the allowed range.
19: Invalid genre.
20: The request body is missing.
21: Invalid device type.
22: Invalid asset type.
23: Invalid value, the min must be less than or equal to the max
24: Invalid scale value

401.description: 0: Authorization has been denied for this request.

403.description:
0: Token Validation Failed
2: You are not authorized to configure this universe.
14: You are not authorized to sell games.

409.description: 9: Failed to shutdown all intances of game after changing AvatarType. The change has been reverted.

get.summary: Gets a page of places for a universe sorted by name.

parameters.name: extendedSettings
parameters.description: If additional settings should be returned including current version and instance constraints

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The amount of results per request.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The paging cursor for the previous or next page.

get.summary: Gets all packages existing for the places in a specified universe, sorted by Name and ID

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sorted by the names and ids of the packages.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The amount of results per request.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The paging cursor for the previous or next page.

401.description: 0: Authorization has been denied for this request.

creatorType.description: Type of the asset version creator.

creatorTargetId.description: ID of the asset version creator.

creatingUniverseId.description: ID of the universe this asset version was created in.

created.description: The created date of this asset version.

isEqualToCurrentPublishedVersion.description:
Indicates if this version is same to current published version.
This property is available on /v1/{assetId}/published-versions and /v1/{assetId}/version/{versionNumber}.

isPublished.description:
Indicates if this version is / was published.
This property is available on /v1/{assetId}/saved-versions.

Action.description: Gets or sets the permitted action, such as 'EDIT' or 'VIEW.'

SubjectType.description: Gets or sets the type of the subject, such as 'User' or 'Group.'

SubjectId.description: Gets or sets the ID of the subject.

Roblox.Api.Develop.Models.PlaceModelV2.description: A model containing information about a place

universeId.description: Returns the id of the place's universe, or null - if the place is not part of a universe.

isRootPlace.description: Returns whether this place is the root place.

Roblox.Api.Develop.Models.PlaceConfigura.description: A model containing information about a place to be configured

universeAvatarType.description: Which avatar types are allowed in the universe.

universeAnimationType.description: Whether custom animations are allowed in the universe.

universeCollisionType.description: What type of collisions are used by the universe.

universeJointPositioningType.description: What avatar joint positioning is allowed by the universe.

isFriendsOnly.description: Whether game access is limited to friends for user-owned games or group members for group-owned games.

playableDevices.description: List of device types this game can be played on.

isForSale.description: Whether the game is offered for sale.

price.description: Price of the game, in Robux.

universeAvatarAssetOverrides.description: A collection of avatar asset settings allowed by the universe.

universeAvatarMinScales.description: A collection of minimum scales for the universe's avatars.

universeAvatarMaxScales.description: A collection of maximum scales for the universe's avatars.

studioAccessToApisAllowed.description: Whether Studio can access data stores of this universe.

permissions.description:
Plugin permissions for third party.
Currently, this is a part of configuration, but will be separated into permission system in the future.

Roblox.Api.Develop.Models.UniversePlugin.description:
Plugin permissions for third party.
Currently, this is a part of configuration, but will be separated into permission system in the future.

IsThirdPartyTeleportAllowed.description: Indicates if it allows game server to teleport to other games out of your universe.

IsThirdPartyAssetAllowed.description: Indicates if it allows players to purchase items not created by you.

IsThirdPartyPurchaseAllowed.description: Indicates if it allows script execution or insertion of models not under your control.

universeAvatarType.description: Which avatar types are allowed in the universe.

universeAnimationType.description: Whether custom animations are allowed in the universe.

universeCollisionType.description: What type of collisions are used by the universe.

universeJointPositioningType.description: What avatar joint positioning type is allowed by the universe.

isFriendsOnly.description: Whether game access is limited to friends for user-owned games or group members for group-owned games.

playableDevices.description: List of device types this game can be played on.

isForSale.description: Whether the game is offered for sale.

price.description: Price of the game, in Robux.

universeAvatarAssetOverrides.description: A list of avatar asset overrides.

universeAvatarMinScales.description: A collection of minimum scales for the universe's avatars.

universeAvatarMaxScales.description: A collection of maximum scales for the universe's avatars.

studioAccessToApisAllowed.description: Whether Studio can access data stores of this universe.

Plugin permissions for third party.
Currently, this is a part of configuration, but will be separated into permission system in the future.
